title: TLC No Scrubs - Live Electronic Cover / Remix

lastfm.summary: "No Scrubs" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 Chart and U.S. Billboard Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs Chart in the Spring of 1999. It is a Grammy Award winning song written by Kevin "She'kspere" Briggs, Lisa "Left Eye" Lopes and former Xscape members Kandi Burruss and Tameka "Tiny" Cottle This was the first single released from Fanmail, the follow-up to TLC's wildly successful second album CrazySexyCool, which sold over 11 million copies. "No Scrubs" kept them in the groove and was a major hit. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: No Scrubs
